item.title: 5. Sustainable Development
item.description: *Taken from The Civil Engineering Exam 5. Sustainable Development While there are now people making whole careers as environmental specialists, your job as a Chartered Civil Engineer will require very intricate involvement with sustainability studies, as described by these sub-parts.

item.title: Sustainability MOC
item.description: Sustainability MOC Sustainability within Civil Engineering is an ever-evolving topic, with new innovations and legislation guiding the industry to embrace sustainability.
